sentences.en: Comet also sired the champion foal out of Spinway Harvest.
sentences.cn: “彗星”还跟“斯平威·哈维斯特”生下了这匹出类拔萃的小马驹。

sentences.en: Each brick also varies slightly in tone, texture and size.
sentences.cn: 每块砖在色调、质地与大小上也都略有不同。

sentences.en: Helen is also 25 and from Birmingham, but the similarity ends there.
sentences.cn: 海伦也是25岁，也来自伯明翰，但是相同之处仅此而已。

sentences.en: I also met with Pollack again to kind of shoot the bull.
sentences.cn: 我也再次和波拉克会面，两人闲聊了会儿。

sentences.en: Information is also available on women’s health care.
sentences.cn: 还可以获得有关女性保健方面的资料。

sentences.en: Its beautiful gardens and parkland are also open to the public.
sentences.cn: 它漂亮的花园和绿地也向公众开放。

sentences.en: Mahler was also known for his passionate involvements outside marriage.
sentences.cn: 马勒也因为其轰轰烈烈的婚外情而出名。

sentences.en: My girlfriend was also called Helen.
Shaun McCalister also played for the varsity basketball team.
sentences.cn: 肖恩·麦卡利斯特也为校篮球队效过力。

sentences.en: She sings beautifully and also plays the flute and piano.
sentences.cn: 她歌唱得好，而且还会吹长笛和弹钢琴。

sentences.en: The battle of the sexes also took a new twist.
sentences.cn: 两性之争也出现了新的变数。

sentences.en: The radio said other parts of the capital also came under shellfire.
sentences.cn: 广播上说首都的其他地区也遭到了炮火袭击。

sentences.en: The system was not only complicated but also ineffective.
sentences.cn: 这套系统不仅复杂而且效率低。

sentences.en: The team also won praise for sportsmanship and fair play.
sentences.cn: 该队还因其良好的体育精神及公平竞争精神而受到了表扬。

sentences.en: The two policemen were joined by another policeman also carrying a pistol.
sentences.cn: 另一名持枪警察和那两名警察会合了。

sentences.en: There were also several accidents mainly caused by engine failures on take-off.
sentences.cn: 还有几次事故主要是起飞时引擎出现故障造成的。

sentences.en: They also left a card, imprinted with the name Sean Lynch.
sentences.cn: 他们还留下了一张名片，上面印着肖恩·林奇的名字。

sentences.en: You should also make your views known to your local MP.
sentences.cn: 你也应该让本地议员了解你的观点。

sentences.en: You'll also get expert advice on keeping your hair in good condition.
sentences.cn: 你还会获得有关如何保持良好发质的专家建议。

phrases.tran_cn: 不仅……而且…… 并且；表强调

trans.tran_en: in addition to something else that you have mentioned
in addition to something else that you have mentioned
